name: Micro (Laouro)
description:
You are a technician working in a micro lab.

You have some tasks to fulfill. Each achievement gives you pride.

Learn some tools used in a real lab.

There a skippable tutorial and a small "story". Otherwise, the game is mainly a simulation. You play mainly by clicking things with you left mouse button. You can also inspect the petri dishes with the right mouse button.

Once you have accomplished the three first tasks, you will enter endless mode. In this mode you will be provided with new random tasks, once you have finished all the pending work.

Made with Game Maker Studio 1.4

Disclaimer :

The way the biological samples are "washed" is very simplified. Don't just throw samples in a sink ! Also sometimes a bensen burner is not enough to manipulate some micro.
